"FOR EVERY OCCASION: A Winter Accessories Catalog"

"CONTENTS\
\
2. Belt\
3. Hat\
4. Cap\
5. Cape\
6. Robe\
7. Cloak\
8. Gloves\
9. Handkerchief\
10. Pouch\
11. Mittens\
12. Scarf\
13. Circlet\
14. Tailoring Book\
15. Updates\
\
All items offered in this catalog are manufactured in accordance with Guild of Clothesmakers guidelines, and will accept all standard customization options of Material, Fit, Color and Embroidering."
"A plain Belt. One size fits all."
"A plain Hat. One size fits all."
"A plain Cap. One size fits all."
"A plain Cape. One size fits all."
"A plain Robe. One size fits all."
"A plain Cloak. One size fits all."
"A pair of plain Gloves. One size fits all."
"A plain Handkerchief. One size fits all."
"A plain Pouch. One size fits all."
"A plain pair of Mittens. One size fits all."
"A plain Scarf. One size fits all."
"A plain Circlet. One size fits all."
"A plain copy of THE PERFECT FIT: Being a Hand-Book For Tailors. Essential reading for students of the craft!"

"UPDATES\
\
New accessory items are always being commissioned by the Master Tailors of Castle Marrach. The text of this catalog will mysteriously update itself as new choices become available.\
\
Please bring typographical errors or other textual problems found in this volume to the attention of any StoryHost."
"[An advertisement for the Guild of Tailors.]"
